comments.en:
Specified as emulating Epson ESC/P; it's unclear if they refer to the classic dot-matrix language, or if this is merely a Stylus engine in disguise.
I have no reports of this, working or not.
This is a multifunction device: scanner/copier/fax/etc; none of that is supported by Linux AFAIK.

Consumables/Refills: Cyan, Yellow, Magenta, and Black ink cartridges
